channel.title: Subscribe to a collection on Hemmlis
channel.description: Recent content in Subscribe to a collection on Hemmlis

item.title: Terms of service for Hemmlis (Sin Pantal EF)
item.description: Definitions Renter - Sin Pantal EF (“Hemmlis”) Rentee - The customer Rented goods - The objects the customer has ordered and will rent. §1. Lease term The rentee commits to renting the goods for the duration specified while ordering. After the duration specified has expired the service is renewed monthly until the rentee or the renter terminates the agreement. §2. Price The price of the rented goods is presented in the documentation received after booking.

item.title: Something went wrong!
item.description: Please try again or contact us.

item.title: Your home will soon be a home!
item.description: An order confirmation has been sent to your email. You will receive a text message within 24 hours confirming your delivery date. For support please contact us on order@hemmlis.se or +46 (0)46 276 90 06.
